result.title: Sherwin-Williams: Q3 Results Make Investors Happy, But Employees Sad
result.text: The Sherwin-Williams Company posted solid Q3 '25 results, with sales up 3.2% and net income rising 3.3% despite soft end-market demand. SHW stock trades at a premium 26x forward P/E, relying on optimistic 2026 EPS growth projections, which may be difficult given real estate headwinds. The Paint Stores Group showed resilience, but Consumer Brands and Performance Coatings segments faced challenges, highlighting uneven demand across channels.
